# Joy (Domain)

**Granted Power:** You gain a +4 sacred bonus on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks.

**Joy Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Vision of Heaven (Spell)|Vision of Heaven]]****:** Evil creature is helpless for 1 round.

**2** **[[Elation (Spell)|Elation]]****:** Allies gain +2 to Strength and Dexterity, +5 ft. of speed.

**3** **[[Distilled Joy (Spell)|Distilled Joy]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Create ambrosia.

**4** **[[Good Hope (Spell)|Good Hope]]****:** Subjects gain +2 on attacks, damage, saves, and checks.

**5** **[[Boisterous Laugh (Spell)|Boisterous Laugh]]****:** Good creatures gain +2 on attack rolls and saves against fear, plus 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max. +20).

   Evil creatures take â€“2 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

**6** **[[Heroism, Greater (Spell)|Heroism, Greater]]****:** Gives +4 bonus on attacks, damage, saves; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

**7** **[[Starmantle (Spell)|Starmantle]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Cloak of stars destroys nonmagical weapons on contact and allows wearer a DC 15 Reflex save 

   to reduce damage from magic weapons by half.

**8** **[[Sympathy (Spell)|Sympathy]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Object or location attracts certain creatures.

**9** **[[Irresistible Dance (Spell)|Irresistible Dance]]****:** Forces subject to dance.

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 87
